text: Bajva is a census town in Vadodara district in the state of Gujarat, India. ==Demographics== India census, Bajva had a population of 9118. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Bajva has an average literacy rate of 68%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 58% of the males and 42% of females literate. 12% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Vadodara district
title: Bajva
